"• If you must walk alone, stay in well-lit areas where there are other people around
 • If you feel unsafe anytime while walking, use a yellow emergency phone to immediately alert The University of Texas at Austin Police Department (UTPD)
 • You can call UTPD from this app on the previous screen
 • Always dial 911 in the event of an emergency"
SUREwalk is a student-run volunteer group that provides walks to and from campus to UT students, faculty, and staff.
Volunteers are gathered from trusted organizations from around campus and include both males and females.
Upon requesting a walk, two volunteers (male and female) will meet you at your current location and walk you to your destination.
SUREwalk does not operate during the summer.
SUREwalk is in service Monday through Thursday from 10 p.m. – 2 a.m. after the first two weeks of the fall and spring semesters.
